message: I propose dividing the $10000 with a 75/25 split in favor of Bob. Let me know if this works for you.
I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  I think this is a fair way to divide the money, given that we both get a decent share.
Considering the inflation, I propose a 50/50 split. This ensures fairness for both of us and avoids further reductions in value.
